channel.title: intalled but can't play
channel.description:
Hi!
I have no pb for installation (stream ok, game download from this site....).
I can launch the game but :
1) I can't access to option menu (no screen appear after i have click) 2) A the end of the trip in train nobody comes to open the door of the wagon.
I know that my computer is really old but perhaps you vwill have a solution.
Thanks
poorgamer

item.title: intalled but can't play
item.dc:creator: Leijonasisu
item.description:
Hl2 is older than Black Mesa… much older. I’d really say that you have no chance in playing the game even on lowest, without significant problems. Even if you manage to get it to run.

Read full topic

item.title: intalled but can't play
item.dc:creator: poorgamer
item.description:
I build my computer in 2003 !!!

But I can play hl2 and open Black-mesa. I thought my pb (no access to option menu, nobody to open the door of the train) can be solved with adjustement of config file but I don’t know how.

Anybody have an Idea?

In advance thanks

Read full topic

item.title: intalled but can't play
item.dc:creator: Leijonasisu
item.description:
I’m surprised the game will even open for you. Your specs are probably the worst I’ve seen so far…

Read full topic

item.title: intalled but can't play
item.dc:creator: poorgamer
item.description:
Heisenberg:

It is probably your computer can you play Half-Life 2: Episode 2? List your system specs here it would be a start on fixing your problem!

thanks for your help :

My system spec :

motherboard : Asus A7N8X
process : Amd Athlon XP 1.09ghz
video card : ATI radeon 9600/9550/X1050 series
Ram Memory : 1.5 Go

I’m abble to play ti HL2 and I succeed playing HL Wilson Chronicles on stream

Read full topic
